001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import android.graphics.Rect;
005import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
006import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
007import java.util.Objects;
008
009/**
010 * Represents a projectile within the game. Projectiles are objects fired from the player's ship to
011 * interact with game elements.
012 */
013public class Projectile {
014
015  private static final int PROJECTILE_SIZE = 20;
016  private static final String TO_STRING_FORMAT = "%1$s[key=%2$s, name=%3$s, move=%4$s]";
017  private final String key = null;
018  int shipPosition;
019  double xVelocity;
020  double yVelocity;
021  double gravity;
022  private GameField gameField;
023  private Rect projectileBox;
024  private double flyingTime;
025  private int positionX;
026  private int positionY;
027  private String name;
028  private boolean move;
029
030  /**
031   * Constructs a Projectile object with specified parameters.
032   *
033   * @param positionX The initial X-coordinate position of the projectile.
034   * @param positionY The initial Y-coordinate position of the projectile.
035   * @param xVelocity The initial velocity in the X direction.
036   * @param yVelocity The initial velocity in the Y direction.
037   * @param gravity   The gravitational force affecting the projectile's movement.
038   * @param gameField The game field in which the projectile exists.
039   */
040  public Projectile(int positionX, int positionY, double xVelocity, double yVelocity,
041      double gravity, GameField gameField) {
042    // TODO: 11/13/23 xposition, yposition, gameFiled, xvelocity and yvelocity.
043    this.xVelocity = xVelocity;
044    this.yVelocity = yVelocity;
045    this.gravity = gravity;
046    this.gameField = gameField;
047    this.positionX = positionX;
048    this.positionY = positionY;
049//    positionX = gameField.getShip().getPositionX();
050//    positionY = gameField.getShip().getPositionY();
051    computeProjectileBox();
052
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Retrieves the X-coordinate position of the projectile.
057   *
058   * @return The X-coordinate position of the projectile.
059   */
060  public int getPositionX() {
061    return positionX;
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Retrieves the Y-coordinate position of the projectile.
066   *
067   * @return The Y-coordinate position of the projectile.
068   */
069  public int getPositionY() {
070    return positionY;
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Retrieves the bounding box of the projectile.
075   *
076   * @return The Rect object representing the bounding box of the projectile.
077   */
078  public Rect getProjectileBox() {
079    return projectileBox;
080  }
081
082//  public Projectile(int positionX, int positionY) {
083//    this.positionX = positionX;
084//    this.positionY = positionY;
085//    computeProjectileBox();
086//  }
087
088  private void computeProjectileBox() {
089    projectileBox = new Rect(positionX - PROJECTILE_SIZE / 2, positionY - PROJECTILE_SIZE / 2,
090        positionX + PROJECTILE_SIZE / 2, positionY + PROJECTILE_SIZE / 2);
091    //Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), projectileBox.toString());
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * Checks if the current projectile intersects with an enemy.
096   *
097   * @param other The Rect object representing the bounding box of the enemies.
098   * @return {@code true} if there is an intersection; {@code false} otherwise.
099   */
100  public boolean intersects(Rect other) {
101    return projectileBox.intersect(other);
102  }
103
104//  public boolean detonate(Rect enemy) {
105//    return projectileBox.intersect(enemy);
106//  }
107
108//  public void fire() {
109//    if (gameField.getShip().canFire(projectileBox)) {
110//      shipPosition = gameField.getShip().getPositionY();
111//      double positionX =
112//          xVelocity * flyingTime; // TODO: 11/2/23 Add a loop to increment the position.
113//      double positionY =
114//          (shipPosition + yVelocity) * flyingTime + (0.5 * gravity * Math.pow(flyingTime, 2));
115//      projectileBox.inset((int) positionX,
116//          (int) positionY); // FIXME: 11/9/23 Check if cast is the  best option for this.
117//      updatePosition();
118//    }
119//  }
120
121  /**
122   * Updates the position of the projectile within the game field. Handles the projectile's movement
123   * based on its velocity and gravity.
124   */
125  public void updatePosition() {
126//    positionX += (int) (xVelocity * flyingTime);
127//    positionY += (int) ((gameField.getShip().getPositionY() + yVelocity) * flyingTime + (0.5 * gameField.getGravity() * Math.pow(flyingTime, 2)))/10;
128//    flyingTime += 0.05;
129    //System.out.println(gameField.getGravity());
130
131    positionX += xVelocity;
132    positionY += yVelocity;
133    yVelocity += (gameField.getGravity()) / 10;
134    computeProjectileBox();
135//    positionX += xVelocity;
136//    positionY += yVelocity;
137//    yVelocity += (gameField.getGravity())/100;
138
139  }
140
141
142  @Override
143  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
144    boolean equivalent;
145    if (obj == this) {
146      equivalent = true;
147    } else if (obj instanceof Projectile other) {
148      //noinspection ConstantValue
149      equivalent = Objects.equals(key, other.key) && Objects.equals(name, other.name)
150          && (move == other.move);
151    } else {
152      equivalent = false;
153    }
154    return equivalent;
155  }
156
157  @Override
158  public int hashCode() {
159    return (name == null) ? Objects.hash(key, name, move) : Objects.hash(key, name);
160  }
161
162  @SuppressLint("DefaultLocale")
163  @NonNull
164  @Override
165  public String toString() {
166    return String.format(
167        TO_STRING_FORMAT, getClass().getSimpleName(), key, name, move);
168  }
169
170}
